name: custom-elements-everywhere
description: Compare how different frameworks handle Web Components.

scripts.install-all: npm run install-angular && npm run install-preact && npm run install-react && npm run install-vue && npm run install-karma-plugins && npm run install-webcomponents
scripts.test: rm -rf docs/libraries && npm run test-angular & npm run test-preact & npm run test-react & npm run test-vue & wait; kill $(jobs -p)
scripts.build: npm run test; cd docs && npm run build
